creator: administrator
title: Learn PHP – For Beginners
content:encoded:
Learn PHP – For Beginners, Learn to create dynamic web applications using PHP.

Students learn to integrate client-server communication into web pages to create dynamic functionality using PHP.

We start with the fundamentals, including PHP syntax and variable declaration. The course transitions into working with objects, arithmetic operators, conditional statements, loops, functions and arrays.

Students will also learn to utilize server side form validation techniques to maintain data integrity.

creator: administrator
title: Learn MySQL – For Beginners
content:encoded:
Learn MySQL – For Beginners, Learn to Create Database Driven Web Applications using MySQL.

Description

Students learn to integrate and administer MySQL databases as part of PHP web application development.

The course begins with an in-depth look into PhpMyAdmin to create, delete and modify databases. We also explore security considerations and user privileges.

Next, students learn to build connections to existing databases in PHP, and execute commands using several essential SQL statements.

creator: administrator
title: Continuous Improvement
content:encoded:
Continuous Improvement,Learn the key initiators, tools and approaches to Continuous Improvement.

Description

Continuous Improvement is a really powerful tool that you can utilise in your organisation or team to make changes that are quick, high impact and low effort. Continuous Improvement has been rolled out in organisations for years, but often this has been done badly. There is a right way to roll out CI, and that is explored in this course. We will cover:

– What is CI (its purpose, benefits and key methodologies)?

– What are the main indicators that a CI Initiative is needed?

– What are the main tools to deploy when building out a CI Initiative?

– Exploring the importance of teams, communication and the toolkit.

– Introduce key methodologies and concepts such as Lean & Six Sigma.

– Understand how to deliver CI in the right way, an effective way that will garner the highest impact.

Continuous Improvement has the power to deliver big savings, big reductions in waste and improvements to quality, customer and employee satisfaction. Deliver the CI mind set right, and the rest will do the work for you. And focus on that phrase mind set! As much as CI is made up of a process, a toolkit and several methodologies (such as Lean Six Sigma) it will only be truly successful if the mindset of those embarking on CI is right.  By taking this course and delivering on the learnings, you will see the power of CI for you, your fellow colleagues and the wider organisation.

creator: administrator
title: Laravel 9 + Filament Beginner Practical Course
content:encoded:
Laravel 9 + Filament Beginner Practical Course, Create AMAZING Admin Backend for PHP apps very fast and easy.

Hello,

In this course, we will tackle a challenge that you will encounter in almost every major PHP project:

How do I get a beautiful and functional backend where I can enter the data for the app?

Using the PHP framework Laravel and the Filament plugin, we will tackle the problem in this course.

CONTENTS OF THE COURSE

Installation of Laravel, Jetstream, and Filament
> With this you basically create an app structure consisting of frontend, user area, and backend.

Creating a filament resource

> With this you can create a table overview of your data and input masks for entering or editing your data in just a few minutes. Of course, we pay attention to optimal usability. The cool thing is, that in this overview page you implement features like sortable columns, searchable columns, filters, and much more, very easily and fast.

> Everything works in real-time with Laravel Livewire (= Ajax)

Management and automatic conversion of images

> With the famous media plugin from the Belgian package maker Spatie, you can manage uploaded files innovatively and bring images into the right format.

Breakdown of HTML templates into layouts and components

> With Laravel’s blade engine, everything remains clear and you can get the data from the database to the frontend exactly where it is needed.

Complicated database queries made easy with Eloquent

> Get data from linked tables (relationships) without SQL headaches. Even sub-queries are automatically created by Laravel, and all this is performance-optimized.

Learn basic Laravel features playfully

  • Models
  • Accessors / Mutators
  • Seeders
  • Fakers
  • Soft-Deletes
  • Stubs
  • Blade
  • Configuration settings

Furthermore, you will have learned how to define and use constants in Laravel.

You will learn all this in this course. Application-related and exactly in the places where it is needed.

YOUR BEST LEARNING EXPERIENCE

If there is any concern, ask questions directly to me – your lecturer – or discuss with other course participants.

All programming steps are stored on GitHub.

A Memory Sheet PDF File will help you to review what you have learned later and understand the individual steps.

Enjoy the course and see you there!

Martin

creator: administrator
title: Marketing Mastery: Strategies to Dominate Your Market
content:encoded:
Marketing Mastery: Strategies to Dominate Your Market, Practical Strategies to Create, Build & Expand Market.

Today’s marketplace is challenging! Numerous players are vying for the same market share. This leads to confusion. Consumers don’t know which brand to buy. In such a scenario, expert marketers can make a product stand out in the market.

Enter, “Marketing Mastery: Strategies to Dominate Your Market.” This detailed course will help you understand the necessary strategies, skills and insights for effective marketing in today’s competitive environment.  Whether you are marketing professional, business owner, entrepreneur, salesperson, student or marketing enthusiast, this course is Right Fit for you.

Throughout this course, you will deep dive into  the principles of strategic marketing, including marketing analysis, segmentation, targeting, positioning and differentiation. You’ll also learn how to develop and implement impactful marketing strategies that align with your business objectives, meet customer needs and outshine competitors.

This course will also equip you with insights into brand positioning and awareness, helping you in building a strong brand identity that resonates with your target audience. You’ll also explore how to measure and optimize marketing performance using key performance indicators (KPIs) and data driven insights.

By the end of this course:

1. You will possess a comprehensive knowledge of strategic marketing

2. Acquire skills needed to execute marketing strategies

3. Be well-prepared to drive sales, boost market share and elevate the brand power

4. Make yourself and your organization a success in the dynamic marketplace

title: Professional Free Frontend Development Course
content:encoded:
Professional Free Frontend Development Course , Professional Free Frontend Development Course for begginers.

A professional frontend development course is a comprehensive and structured program designed to equip individuals with the essential skills and knowledge required to excel in the field of web development. This course caters to both beginners looking to kickstart their careers and experienced developers seeking to enhance their skill sets.

Throughout the course, participants will learn the fundamentals of frontend development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. They’ll gain a deep understanding of how to create visually appealing and interactive user interfaces for websites and web applications. The curriculum covers topics such as responsive design, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility, ensuring that students can produce websites that work seamlessly across various platforms and devices.

Professional frontend development courses often delve into modern development tools and frameworks, such as Bootstrap, React, and Vue.js, which empower students to build dynamic, data-driven applications. Instructors guide learners through hands-on projects and real-world scenarios, fostering problem-solving skills and creativity.

Furthermore, these courses emphasize best practices in version control, code optimization, and performance tuning, ensuring that graduates are capable of delivering high-quality, efficient code. They also teach the importance of collaborating with backend developers and designers to create cohesive, feature-rich web applications.

As technology is continuously evolving, professional frontend development courses frequently include modules on emerging web technologies and trends, keeping students up to date with the latest advancements. Graduates of these courses are well-prepared for roles such as front-end developers, user interface designers, and web application developers, and they possess a skill set that is in high demand in today’s digital landscape. Overall, a professional frontend development course is an invaluable investment for anyone looking to build a successful career in the web development industry.

title: Work Smarter, Not Harder: Mastering Remote Productivity Tech
content:encoded:
Work Smarter, Not Harder: Mastering Remote Productivity Tech, Be highly productive at work and at home by mastering time management and arming yourself with the necessary tools.

In today’s digital age, working remotely has become increasingly prevalent, offering flexibility and convenience. However, without the proper strategies and techniques, remote work can pose unique challenges to productivity. This comprehensive online course, “Work Smarter, Not Harder: Mastering Remote Productivity Techniques,” is designed to equip remote professionals with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in their virtual workspaces.

Throughout this course, you will delve into proven strategies and practical approaches that will empower you to maximize your productivity while working from home. Whether you are a remote worker, freelancer, or entrepreneur, this course will provide you with the essential tools and insights to unlock your full potential and achieve your professional goals.

Key Course Features:

  • 1. Understand the Remote Work Landscape: Gain a deeper understanding of the remote work landscape, exploring the benefits and challenges it presents. Learn how to leverage these unique circumstances to your advantage and enhance your productivity.
  • 2. Establish Effective Work Routines: Discover the secrets to establishing effective work routines that optimize your energy levels, focus, and productivity. Explore techniques for setting priorities, managing time effectively, and creating a healthy work-life balance.
  • 3. Optimize Your Virtual Workspace: Learn how to create a productive and ergonomic home office environment that promotes concentration, minimizes distractions, and supports your overall well-being. Explore tips for organizing digital files, managing emails, and utilizing technology to streamline your workflow.
  • 4. Master Time and Task Management: Develop advanced time management skills specifically tailored to remote work. Explore techniques for prioritizing tasks, setting realistic goals, and overcoming procrastination. Discover strategies for effective project management and collaboration in virtual teams.
  • 5. Boost Focus and Concentration: Overcome common distractions and interruptions that can hinder productivity while working from home. Learn practical techniques for enhancing focus, managing digital distractions, and practicing mindfulness to maintain concentration.
  • 6. Enhance Communication and Collaboration: Explore strategies for effective communication and collaboration in remote work settings. Learn how to leverage various communication tools, establish clear expectations, and maintain strong professional relationships virtually.
  • 7. Cultivate Self-Motivation and Accountability: Discover methods for boosting self-motivation and staying accountable to your goals and deadlines. Explore techniques for overcoming motivation slumps, managing work-related stress, and maintaining a positive mindset.
  • 8. Overcome Challenges and Stay Productive: Gain valuable insights into overcoming common challenges faced by remote professionals, such as isolation, work-life integration, and maintaining work boundaries. Learn practical strategies for overcoming these obstacles and thriving in your remote work environment.

By the end of this course, you will have acquired a comprehensive set of remote productivity techniques that will empower you to work smarter, not harder. You will be equipped with the skills to overcome distractions, optimize your workflow, and achieve peak productivity while working from home. Enroll today and embark on a journey towards mastering remote productivity and unlocking your full potential in the virtual work landscape.

Benefits :

1. Enhanced Productivity: Gain the knowledge and skills to optimize your time, energy, and focus, resulting in heightened productivity and the ability to accomplish more in less time.

2. Improved Work-Life Balance: Discover strategies for maintaining a healthy work-life balance while working remotely, enabling you to prioritize personal well-being and spend quality time with loved ones.

3. Effective Communication and Collaboration: Learn techniques for effective communication and collaboration in virtual workspaces, fostering strong professional relationships and seamless teamwork with colleagues and clients.

4. Reduced Distractions and Increased Focus: Overcome common distractions associated with remote work, such as social media, household responsibilities, and personal interruptions. Develop strategies to boost focus and concentration, enabling you to stay on track and accomplish tasks efficiently.

5. Long-Term Success in Remote Work: Develop a comprehensive skill set and mindset that will empower you to succeed in the remote work environment not just temporarily, but for the long term. Acquire the tools to adapt to evolving work trends and maximize your potential as a remote professional.

title: Learn JavaScript – For Beginners
content:encoded:
Learn JavaScript – For Beginners, Learn how to Code Web Pages using JavaScript.

Description

Students learn to add dynamic, interactivity to web pages using JavaScript.

We start with exploring the fundamental concepts, including JavaScript placement and output functions. We then transition to working with arithmetic operators, math functions, arrays, sorting, conditional statements and loops. Students also learn to work with events and functions.

The course includes several hands-on exercises to help students master this essential scripting language.

title: Master Six Sigma: Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt 2023
content:encoded:
Master Six Sigma: Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt 2023 , Accredited Lean Six Sigma Black Belt training and certification. 40k+ Lean Six Sigma Black Belts certified.

My name is Hamza ELOUAZZANI, I am a Logistics Specialist & Analyst, with a Master’s degree in Logistics Management. I am currently working as a Senior Supply Chain & Customer Service at a multinational. I carried out about thirty projects during these 5 years of experience in this field. I want to share my knowledge and contribute in my own way to the development of global logistics.

Actually I have more than 75 000+ Students. And the average of feedback is around 4,4/5 Stars.

I’m taking care about your questions & suggestions, also i’m doing my best to answering to your feedbacks.

Black Belt Mastery: Advanced Techniques for Leading Complex Improvement Projects is an online course designed for professionals who want to take their Six Sigma skills to the next level. In this course, participants will learn advanced techniques for leading complex improvement projects, including project management, problem-solving, data analysis, and statistical process control.

The course is divided into modules, each focusing on a specific topic. The modules are designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of the Six Sigma methodology, as well as the skills and tools required to lead successful improvement projects.

The course begins with an introduction to Six Sigma and the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, and Control) process. Participants will learn how to identify and define problems, gather data, and use statistical methods to analyze the data and identify root causes.

The course then moves on to advanced topics such as project management, leadership, and team building. Participants will learn how to manage projects effectively, including how to develop project plans, manage project risks, and communicate with stakeholders.

The course also covers problem-solving techniques such as Six Sigma’s TRIZ (Theory of Inventive Problem Solving) and Design of Experiments (DOE). Participants will learn how to apply these techniques to identify creative solutions to complex problems.

In addition, participants will learn how to use statistical process control (SPC) to monitor and control processes. They will learn how to use control charts and other SPC tools to identify and correct process variations, and how to implement and sustain process improvements.

Throughout the course, participants will have access to interactive learning materials, including videos, quizzes, case studies, and assignments. They will also have the opportunity to collaborate with other participants and the course instructor through online forums and discussion boards.

Upon completion of the course, participants will have gained advanced skills in Six Sigma methodology, project management, problem-solving, data analysis, and statistical process control. They will be well-equipped to lead complex improvement projects and achieve significant business results. Participants will also receive a certificate of completion to recognize their achievement.

Black Belt Mastery: Advanced Techniques for Leading Complex Improvement Projects is an online course designed for professionals who want to take their Six Sigma skills to the next level. In this course, participants will learn advanced techniques for leading complex improvement projects, including project management, problem-solving, data analysis, and statistical process control.
The course is divided into modules, each focusing on a specific topic. The modules are designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of the Six Sigma methodology, as well as the skills and tools required to lead successful improvement projects.
The course begins with an introduction to Six Sigma and the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, and Control) process. Participants will learn how to identify and define problems, gather data, and use statistical methods to analyze the data and identify root causes.
The course then moves on to advanced topics such as project management, leadership, and team building. Participants will learn how to manage projects effectively, including how to develop project plans, manage project risks, and communicate with stakeholders.
The course also covers problem-solving techniques such as Six Sigma’s TRIZ (Theory of Inventive Problem Solving) and Design of Experiments (DOE). Participants will learn how to apply these techniques to identify creative solutions to complex problems.
In addition, participants will learn how to use statistical process control (SPC) to monitor and control processes. They will learn how to use control charts and other SPC tools to identify and correct process variations, and how to implement and sustain process improvements.
Throughout the course, participants will have access to interactive learning materials, including videos, quizzes, case studies, and assignments. They will also have the opportunity to collaborate with other participants and the course instructor through online forums and discussion boards.
Upon completion of the course, participants will have gained advanced skills in Six Sigma methodology, project management, problem-solving, data analysis, and statistical process control. They will be well-equipped to lead complex improvement projects and achieve significant business results. Participants will also receive a certificate of completion to recognize their achievement.

title: Mastering Logical Fallacies: How to Think & React positivly
content:encoded:
Mastering Logical Fallacies: How to Think & React positivly , Mastering Logical Fallacies How to Think Critically and Avoid Common Errors.

My name is Hamza ELOUAZZANI, I am a Logistics Specialist & Analyst, with a Master’s degree in Logistics Management. I am currently working as a Senior Supply Chain & Customer Service at a multinational. I carried out about thirty projects during these 5 years of experience in this field. I want to share my knowledge and contribute in my own way to the development of global logistics.

Actually I have more than 75 000+ Students. And the average of feedback is around 4,4/5 Stars.

I’m taking care about your questions & suggestions, also i’m doing my best to answering to your feedbacks.

Mastering Logical Fallacies: How to Think Critically and Avoid Common Errors is an online course designed to help learners develop critical thinking skills and avoid common mistakes in reasoning. The course covers the most common types of logical fallacies, including formal and informal fallacies, causal fallacies, and fallacies in decision-making, advertising, politics, and everyday life. It provides learners with the tools and techniques to recognize and avoid these fallacies and improve their reasoning and argumentation skills.

Course Structure:

The course is divided into 14 modules, each focusing on a specific topic related to logical fallacies. Each module consists of a series of video lectures, quizzes, and assignments to help learners develop a deep understanding of the material. The course is self-paced, allowing learners to progress through the material at their own speed.

Module 1: Introduction to Logical Fallacies In this module, learners will be introduced to the concept of logical fallacies, why they are important to understand, and how they can affect our thinking.

Module 2: Types of Logical Fallacies This module covers the two main types of logical fallacies – formal and informal – and provides examples of each type.

Module 3: Formal Fallacies This module focuses on formal fallacies, which are mistakes in the structure of an argument. Learners will learn how to recognize and avoid common formal fallacies.

Module 4: Informal Fallacies – Part 1 This module covers some of the most common informal fallacies, including ad hominem, appeal to authority, and false dilemma.

Module 5: Informal Fallacies – Part 2 This module covers additional examples of informal fallacies, including hasty generalization, slippery slope, and strawman argument.

Module 6: Causal Fallacies This module covers causal fallacies, which are mistakes in the causal relationship between events. Learners will learn how to recognize and avoid common causal fallacies.

Module 7: Fallacies in Decision Making This module covers how fallacies can affect our decision-making process and provides examples of common fallacies in decision making.

Module 8: Logical Fallacies in Advertising This module covers how advertisers use fallacious reasoning to manipulate consumers and provides examples of fallacious advertising claims.

Module 9: Logical Fallacies in Politics This module covers how politicians use fallacious reasoning to sway voters and provides examples of fallacious political arguments.

Module 10: Logical Fallacies in Everyday Life This module covers how fallacies can affect our everyday interactions and provides examples of fallacious reasoning in everyday life.

Module 11: Critical Thinking Skills This module covers the importance of critical thinking and provides techniques for developing critical thinking skills.

Module 12: Evaluating Arguments This module covers how to evaluate arguments for logical fallacies and provides tools and techniques for identifying and analyzing flawed arguments.

Module 13: Debating Techniques This module covers how to use logical reasoning in debates and provides effective debating techniques.

Module 14: Putting it All Together This module provides a review of the key concepts and skills covered in the course and offers guidance on how to apply the knowledge to real-world scenarios.
